text: <@U01JNTE35QS> yes it would be lovely if it could stand alone as its own sort of language. At this stage of exploring ideas it's just super handy to just point some lua code at things in this way though. Especially as when I'm not manipulation the notation itself I don't have to worry about hands and pens getting in the way of the camera. I need to grapple with that problem at some point though!
